title: The Fallen Leaf
overview: Nira is perfect! Men can not resist her beauty. But surrounding are not even aware that she used to be a guy named Wai. Since childhood, my father was abusing their son and wife, and the only one who supported them was the uncle Wai, Catcave. Vai falls in love with his uncle, but he rejects his feelings. Unable to withstand the attacks, Vai and his mother flee to London. After the death of his mother, the girl returns to Thailand Nira to seduce their abusers and take revengeâ€¦
